subject: The Friday Unwind: Your week in one smooth scroll
description_text:
Catch up on what’s happened this week — no stress, just the highlights.

View in browser (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWn5D47PFppXVMtL2t4948r4W5QKV2t5GJ9hTN26s60K5n4LbW7Y9pgv6lZ3n5W89tF_y4DclspW3-s9Cq539zWQW660l7P1WV9ChW8ByNzH2h_Rm9W383mXm625gz9W6KymF21P5VvxW6kpRJ05kRKqgW5X31LP8Z3drxW10nyYX9h231tW1SJhPL3zprs7N1v0SPDgQJZbVsz7zt4drHf-W31J6gz7tZRzjW5Y65-w7K5Z-6N5ZJd7wxW7TMN4-w_7lQldvMW2TxK-X8n9lhXW80CSfh3rRCp-W1LVNCM4GDy0ZW3H0VNX6Ys8wNMds0R8D02TzW7SDKRq88b17JW543vbZ3nTZn0W8Q9pD_8x5n7DW7_y8pR8MlB7zW6fs3Gb7HldSpW8mK6Js8SnRnJVFl7wf2QNh62W8z5Cvz5tWLrwW40bBRq8c_ZgDN2fp3Q0M4DN7W3SCnSJ3KYmPQW2557Mw1YF3g0W11XJSk62yNq6W2F-pn14h93BYV2gFvt5CvM5LW5gB3224zbcJ1W2YXjBk43qp2CVkSmNf2mw4y7VHHLSn2bLbGlW2B0BB15hWTCDW3bt5XV81Yy7Kf1JWX7Y04 )



Hey Atto,

It's time! December’s here, and peak season isn’t slowing down. As shoppers shift, expectations rise, and competition tightens, we’ve rounded up the highlights worth your clicks.

This week: a fresh look at Grow 25 Volume 4, new sessions on AI search and conversion strategy, smarter ways to power Google Shopping, expert insights on tech stack optimisation, and a standout case study from Topps Tiles.

Catch you next Friday,

– The Athos Commerce Team





Featured This Week

? Ebook | Grow 25 Volume 4 (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWn5D47PFppXVMtL2t4948r4W5QKV2t5GJ9hTN26s60K3pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3nzW6fGTSw1fl77tN2XGR15Lph-VW40Qnd06-2Y5-W9lD1_f3wmy2xW4cCSWZ5T1YBFW8M2_Dm4QbcpZN7x5xc6Q-NXzW1d7Y3Q2M3thrW5z37D32LPVLgW4wf-xH7L3cHQW6wqdst3WPtznW5dFw1m2TH3F7W16znZY71TBXsW2nR9dV2tcKm5W7NBMnP6pt3TTV1dYKQ4MFWVCW21lCnV8vl5ylW49mMxq2wdzQjW8QcQDQ4_LM8vW5ZRB_Q3Y7s_zW3v44nK87xY46W42sNlw6LjlHLW2NV28P3r5tzbW8NT-gv7ZW4gqW99Jsf37b46rdW5x4ZzC1G5SLlf7jgxQg04 )

Explore how human creativity and AI are redefining ecommerce - unlocking personalisation, accessibility, and innovation in the future of commerce.





Webinar | AI Discovery and the Future of Ecommerce Search (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWn5D47PFppXVMtL2t4948r4W5QKV2t5GJ9hTN26s5_d5n4LbW50kH_H6lZ3mmW5zzpb76kSF-kW1XWPD15sr3bqW41Jdg29gKV-gW3Gfd584WMv5-W5Z0G9b3-_1YwW1FD1Yf6HYPzBW99rftN6Y3rJmW6WHMyj5R1jM0W8m-tYC85_gZ9W5xSpDg6R6g18W1Hrl2q7Nl-TWW7x_zcq2t6NhfVZvL5-8Zby08VFssYT8BRymBW868M9S7n_FbwW8RrMfv8Dc1FLW3MbSrT6fdd-3W2dFR-p10ZbjsW5yZ58F7DlRnnW7Bb9P25ypwl2N21JdC3KsNYfVQtz-06dl_XZW2sJp5s24Q8p6MgqJ5_y0_cHW46Y65Y11v1SJVJ6J1j8LDPwTW3sSg816RrW-dW3M2CgR1ps4VJW8YVK1Y4v3kWnW6Vz3666DlCXFW7CJ04R3Fgl5JW8Fd8bq1wSlt6f8HrBjx04 )

AI search is here to stay. Learn how Large Language Models (LLMs) decide which brands to cite, rank, and recommend, and what ecommerce teams can do to stay visible.

Webinar | From Dust to Data: Vacuuming Up Insights from Ecommerce’s Top Performers (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWn5D47PFppXVMtL2t4948r4W5QKV2t5GJ9hTN26s61j3pyd0W95jsWP6lZ3lZW34YjJh3HtqCJW66kD2K7LPD8qW5B1kKd3X3QXcVKXv2l8-fb0dW25G0jJ2Dsv1BW3Rl7nh701FrfW7h7gHh4_38lBW2G-SWC8tYx67W2_DWmT43h_93W6-h8Dn33N8vLW3XGkLd1d8-q6N5Fm0m5bCjwTW1VsKTJ6mCftcW13qLsT57gb8SW5HXpx085SvRpW21cQq52R85G1W9cycDy6pl3HXW4Wj4Xd44Rm2RVqx7645zP5xMW1wjj2g8Kh_mwW3PkLDh92LdGFW7RZPRd5rcvSxW3Wbmf-55680DVwFql05G_xRxW6MslZQ7Wy9vMW24H_pG4812bNW5FPzqn9lP2r9W3kVvZj1NrcjJW6SvFnv137lCrW3yFB399hWHHtf2gBc0R04 )

GENE, Athos Commerce and Akoova are bringing to life the findings of the eCommerce Insights & Strategies Report - a deep analysis of how eCom leaders are navigating growth, technology, and performance.

On-demand Webinar | From Discovery to Conversion: Play-by-Play Insights from Kick Game & Ecommerce Experts (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWn5D47PFppXVMtL2t4948r4W5QKV2t5GJ9hTN26s5_d5n4LbW50kH_H6lZ3lrN430HBZ4p5x0W86RP3v2c5fjwVcx47M4PkzbTVKGCj15ssW09W1kl-Ds7gvRxHW7Qp6gf33GkPvW8L9qh76mKF3QW2R_D9J7G7l5zW99tt443713dYW3wvx7c38314CW33Tzyc8_x8jTW2r291r3Qm5H-W2fmwqc3mLBBgW6-jdC-6MmP15W5C_mf64lBV2RW8-r8mc4XT-bFW3SLTJw6DCpmxW2dGfGS3KJ3XqW5nzwr536mGLWV-SCYt6cL0j2W8ZB0gF6PWTPKW3xYWtV3bZD0yN7hT53TnQDY2W1b0HTX937FfVW30Xztq5wFkvpW46gL5462jTwTW360gVt7MMFC_W8L9mPK78G13RW36CwJh6syL0GW2gQ_JQ8vhMr5W121D395BPBFPW4dFMMQ3-DCNPf2STg3604 )
